name: Meteor Mayhem (itch) (Astronauten Dev)
description:
Theme: There's a twist...!

This game was made for Trijam #154, and it was also the first jam I participated in! I tried to keep the development time under 3 hours, but it took a little over 4 hours to finish this. The game is made with C++ and SFML, and it can be a bit buggy, because the code is a mess. But anyway, I hope you enjoy!

My twitter: https://twitter.com/AstronautenDev

How to play:

Your goal is to get as many points as possible. To gain points, you need to catch the white meteors. But be careful, there's a twist! If you don't have time to reach for one falling white meteor you'll lose one health. Also, if you touch the red meteors, you will lose one health.

The game was made by me, so all the art and code was made during the jam. However, I copied some of the code from my previous projects and used Bfxr to generate the sounds. Also the font was made by csanyk: https://csanyk.itch.io/min-font Also the cover image was made before the jam.

If any problem occurs (the game crasher etc..) (I'm super sorry), leave a comment I'll try to fix it. Keep in mind that this was made in 4 hours, so the code isn't perfect at all, and that bugs can occur. :)
